stories.text:
So we decided to test the demand for a service that would help small brands land influencers that are knocking on their DMs.

Usually it takes a lot of waiting and communicating on both parts if conducted on Instagram.

Instead a brand could have a landing page with the offer and terms of partnerships they usually offer to influencers and just send this link to an influencer.

Influencer then could read it and apply by connecting their IG handle.

Brand would receive all the information about all applicants in one beautifully organized dashboard with the ability to:

1. Analyze the insights 2. Approve/Reject influencer 3. Get contact info and then negotiate the details off the platform.

Additionally, we would add the campaign performance & reporting in the near future.

Let me know if you know any e-commerce owners who would love to give our product a test and provide a feedback:)
stories.title: Landing social media influencers with one link. Simplifying e-com life
